en.purpose: To determine the appropriate adjuvant regimen based on TNM stage and risk factors.
en.use: Use to evaluate patients post-radical surgery.
en.misuse: Not to be used for other types of cancer.

other_details.references:
Osterman E, Glimelius B. Recurrence Risk After Up-to-Date Colon Cancer Staging, Surgery, and Pathology: Analysis of the Entire Swedish Population. Dis Colon Rectum. 2018 Sep;61(9):1016-1025. doi: 10.1097/DCR.0000000000001158. Erratum in: Dis Colon Rectum. 2020 Mar;63(3):e36-e37. doi: 10.1097/DCR.0000000000001618. PMID: 30086050.

Nationellt vårdprogram tjock- och ändtarmscancer [Internet]. Regionala cancercentrum i samverkan; 2023 [cited 2026 Jan 15]. 13.5 Adjuvant cytostatikabehandling. Tabell 17. Available from: https://kunskapsbanken.cancercentrum.se/diagnoser/tjock-och-andtarmscancer/vardprogram/adjuvant-cytostatikabehandling/
other_details.en: Recommentations for adjuvant chemotherapy for colorectal cancer after radical surgery

when: ($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0011|T4 N0, pMMR/MSS|&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0017|0–1 risk factor|)||($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0009|T3 N0, pMMR/MSS|&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0018|≥ 2 risk factors|)

(($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0012|T1–2 N1, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|||$gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0013|T3 N1, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|)&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0017|0–1 risk factor|)||($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0011|T4 N0, pMMR/MSS|&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0018|≥ 2 risk factors|)
then: $gt0006|Adjuvant kemoterapi|=local::at0008|CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months|
$gt0006|Adjuvant kemoterapi|=local::at0008|CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months|

$gt0007|Observation|=local::at0011|If combination therapy is not used for any reason, fluoropyrimidine monotherapy is used for 6 months, except in dMMR/MSI-high stage II–III disease, where combination therapy is preferred.|

when: (($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0014|T4 N1, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|||$gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0015|Tx N2, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|)&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0017|0–1 risk factor|)||($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0012|T1–2 N1, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0018|≥ 2 risk factors|)
then: $gt0006|Adjuvant kemoterapi|=local::at0009|CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months|
$gt0006|Adjuvant kemoterapi|=local::at0009|CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months|
$gt0007|Observation|=local::at0012|Oxaliplatin should be discontinued after 6 months to avoid persistent neuropathy. Treatment should then continue with fluoropyrimidine monotherapy.|

when: ($gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0014|T4 N1, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|||$gt0003|TNM stage|==local::at0015|Tx N2, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|local::at0015|Tx N2, dMMR/MSI‑high and pMMR/MSS|)&&$gt0004|Risk factors|==local::at0018|≥ 2 risk factors|
then: $gt0006|Adjuvant kemoterapi|=local::at0010|CAPOX for 3-6 months or FOLFOX for 6 months|

gt0001.description: Recommendations for adjuvant chemotherapy for colon cancer after radical surgery.

gt0008.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: Fluoropyrimidine for 6 months.

gt0009.text: Set to CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months.
gt0009.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months.

gt0010.text: Set to CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months.
gt0010.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months.

gt0011.text: Set to CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months with observation.
gt0011.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 3 months.

gt0012.text: Set to CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months with observation.
gt0012.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months.

gt0013.text: Set to CAPOX for 3-6 months or FOLFOX for 6 months.
gt0013.description: adjuvant kemotherapy recommendation: CAPOX for 3 months or FOLFOX for 6 months.
